attributes.action: Make Teachers undertake other jobs in industry during school holidays to give them a better idea of how the real world outside of education has to cope with the product of their work in education
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Educators and academics are charged with the task of preparing young people for the world of work.  Education is by its nature an isolated environment that is a far cry from the world of business where most of the young people in education will end up.   Teachers enjoy far too many "holidays" and should be made to undertake work in industry/business during the holidays so that they gain a better appreciation of the world of work for which they're preparing young people.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
